trans-unit.source: Represents the contents of the optional <see langword="Subcode" /> element of a SOAP fault when SOAP version 1.2 is used to communicate between a client and an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 當 SOAP 1.2 版用於在用戶端與 XML Web Service 之間進行通訊時，表示 SOAP 錯誤之選擇性 <see langword="Subcode" /> 項目的內容。

trans-unit.source: A SOAP 1.2 fault contains a `Code` element and among other things an optional `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.2 錯誤包含`Code`項目，以及選擇性的其他項目`Subcode`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `Code` element specifies the type of error that occurred using a limited number of pre-defined error codes specified by the SOAP protocol, whereas the `Subcode` element allows the sender of the SOAP fault to provide an application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: `Code`項目會指定使用有限的數目的 SOAP 通訊協定所指定的預先定義的錯誤代碼，而時發生的錯誤類型的`Subcode`項目可讓寄件者的 SOAP 錯誤以提供應用程式特定錯誤程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the contents of the `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表的內容`Subcode`項目。

trans-unit.source: XML Web services return a SOAP fault by throwing a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>, and .NET clients receive a SOAP fault by catching a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務傳回 SOAP 錯誤，所擲回<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>，和.NET 用戶端會收到 SOAP 錯誤，藉由捕捉<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> has a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A> property that represents the `Code` element and a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A> property that represents the `Subcode` element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>具有<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code%2A>屬性代表`Code`項目和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.SubCode%2A>屬性代表`Subcode`項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubcode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> specifying the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />，指定應用程式特定錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" /> class and sets the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" /> 類別的新執行個體並設定應用程式特定的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> specifying the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />，指定應用程式特定錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" /> class setting the application specific error code and additional error information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" /> 類別的新執行個體，設定應用程式特定錯誤碼和其他錯誤資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application specific error code in the form of an XML qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用 XML 限定名稱格式的應用程式特定錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> representing the application specific error code.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />，表示應用程式特定錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: Use a constructor to set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用建構函式來設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A> property can be any user defined XML qualified name, including the codes represented by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIdFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType> fields.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.Code%2A>屬性可以是任何使用者定義 XML 限定的名稱，包括由碼<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcProcedureNotPresentFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.RpcBadArgumentsFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingMissingIdFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.Soap12FaultCodes.EncodingUntypedValueFaultCode?displayProperty=nameWithType>欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets additional error information contained within a child <see langword="Subcode" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得子 <see langword="Subcode" /> 項目中包含的其他錯誤資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" /> containing additional error information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode" />，包含其他錯誤資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use a constructor to set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用建構函式來設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode%2A> property allows an XML Web service to provide nested error information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode.SubCode%2A>屬性可讓 XML Web service 提供巢狀的錯誤資訊。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for providing an error code specific to the XML Web service while passing along error information returned from components the XML Web service called.
trans-unit.target: 這是用來將傳遞沿著錯誤資訊傳回從 XML Web service 呼叫的元件時，提供 XML Web 服務的特定錯誤碼。
